name: Moon Chaser (itch)
description:
Your rations of pure moonlight have run out, you must therefor journey up the treacherous Moon Mountain to the Moon Altar.

But you have to be fast, for only the purest midnight moonlight will suffice.

Use spells to vanquish the terrifying Bounce Trolls and imbue your mighty steed with the swiftness of the wind

WASD to move

Left Mouse button to attack

Space to dash like the wind

Made for Create Jam Fall 2020

Programmer: Adam Husted Kjelstrøm

Art: Andreas Clement Holmgaard

Music Licenses:

Strength Of The Titans by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5744-strength-of-the-titans
